title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.

title: John Johnston
synopsis: [http://johnjohnston.name John Johnston] will tell you a wee bit about me.

title: Local Changes
synopsis: Here we list pages kept in the browser's local storage. Use the (X) to discard these copies. See also [[Recent Changes]].
